name: Firelight Ritual Site
text: You can Ritual Summon monsters that are in your Pendulum Zones as if they are in your hand. Once per turn; if a "Firelight" card you control is destroyed to Ritual Summon a "Firelight" monster in the Pendulum Scale, you can add that destroyed card to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Firelight Ritual Site" once per turn.
